blog.title: Sketches and Souvenirs
blog.name: isaia
blog.description:
Hi Friend how are you?

This blog is mostly me making ridiculous fanart, crying over cartoons, media and social criticism, ladies, and can be mono fandom for months to years at a time.

I'm really into: Avatar: The Last Airbender, Disney, the Animes, Folktales from long ago and far away, narrative integrity, storyboarding/visual development inspiration. 

And I really dig Green Lantern: The Animated Series right now!
(◡‿◡✿)

tags: BY THE BARRICADES: WALMART/KMART/TOYS R US
posts.title: PSA
posts.body:
inbetweenthelineart:

themaskedman:

inbetweenthelineart:

razaya:

A Master post will be made soon to send to various sites regarding shows and merchandise, for those that want the names of who to contact now here are some:

K Mart

WalMart

Toys R Us

Send them lots of mail and make them regret not wanting to put new toys on the shelves, everyone!

Woah woah guys slow down. NO. These company’s have very little to nothing to do with the production of actual Merchandise for YJ & GLTAS.

These retailers purchase the toylines from the company’s such as Mattel, Jazware, Hasbro etc. If you’re peeved about what figures are actually on the shelf it’s due to what people purchase. And a heads up, a lot of the time it’s down to personal branches as to what toylines to stock in their shelves not the head branches of a company. 

I don’t quite understand what you’re trying to accomplish by messaging them… please, don’t bother them…

Giancarlo was actually the one who suggested we do this. 

giancarlovolpe replied to your post: New Plan of Attack

I just wanna point out that WB wasn’t really at blame here - if anything, our fate was sealed when retailers like K Mart, Walmart, Toys R Us, etc, refused to carry anything with “Green Lantern” on it. Maybe people should write THEM

No toys were made because these places didn’t want to carry them. Letting them know they made a mistake might send a message and make them reconsider carrying toys, and if our other campaign stuff worked well enough, talks could begin to start new seasons on the shows knowing they could make a profit. 

It’s a long shot, but honestly, we’re willing to try anything at this point.

notes.added_text: Sent out my e-mails. :)
Can I say as someone that works in retail that it’s great when customers tell us they want something, but if it doesn’t...
^ Also, a master post will be up soon with all the people to contact :)
Got it, so WB could continue it, because the TOY companies pulled the plug. That makes more sense now. o__o
Looks like I’ve got some letter writing ahead of me this week.
No toys were made because these places didn’t want to carry them. Letting them know they made a mistake might send a...
Woah woah guys slow down. NO. These company’s have very little to nothing to do with the production of actual...

posts.title: IM GOIN TO BURBANK, MOFOS
posts.body:
ME RIGHT NOW??!?!??!!

LONG STORY SHORT, I finally got some days off and am taking a short Spring Break trip there with my fronds!!! Twerkin on remaining commissions on the plane, am on my way to airport, and I will be meeting Giancarlo IRL and yelling/crying/losing my collective Green Lantern cookies  together with Junryou and Inbetweenthelineart.

If you guys want us to relay an emotional IRL message to him, lemme kno!
Also if you want me and my girls to barge in to MEDIA HEADQUARTERS like this to appeal to DC NATION if we are not too afraid of getting partyvanned, OK!!!!

There will be an intensive documentation of DC Nation Meet-Up and me embarrassing the crap out of myself, and everyone in the surrounding area rolling their eyes in exasperation.
YES?
yes.

MORE NEWS AT 10!!!! 

Have hope, friends. Chin up in the face of adversity! You are not alone!!!

posts.title: New Plan of Attack
posts.body:
inbetweenthelineart:

Alright, so we’ve gotten a slew of new info today regarding some of the decisions that went into canceling Green Lantern: The Animated Series (and most likely by extension, Young Justice).

1) Toys. The GL movie didn’t do well, the toys didn’t do well. (So of course that means toys for something related but completely different will fail. Riiiight.)

2) WB had the biggest role to play in GLTAS’s cancelation. Apparently, CN actually liked the direction the show was going in, but WB again went with the failed success of the movie to base its decision on.

3) iTunes/DVD sales weren’t/aren’t high enough for them. 

So what can we take away from this?

We need to be contacting WB just as much as we are contacting Cartoon Network.

Start sending the letters and packages you sent in to CN headquarters to WB as well. Make sure you mention that you’d like to buy merchandise. If someone could get the address we should be sending things to, that would be great. I have no idea how this works. lol

Tweet to WB everyday, and during the campaign on Saturday. 

Email WB: http://www.warnerbros.com/help/customer-service.html (I just chose “Other”)

Comment on WB’s Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/warnerbrosent?fref=ts

BUY THE EPISODES ON ITUNES, BUY THE DVDS, BUY THE SOUNDTRACK, BUY THE TOYS. I know we’re not made of money, but if there are things you can cut back on (smoking, sweets, going out to eat, etc), you’ll be able to save up enough to buy a few of these things. Ask for them for gifts if you have a birthday coming up! Get them as gifts for friends and family!

Of course, this doesn’t mean you should stop contacting CN. Keep up the pace for both companies, and someone with the right connections is bound to notice.

Mattel is also the company to contact about toys and merchandise.

Even if we don’t get the shows back as shows, there’s still a chance we could potentially get them back as direct-to-video releases or comics or online series. So we CANNOT let our efforts wane now. We need to keep pestering these people until something happens.

PHASE 3 BATTLE PLAN MOFOS.
LET”S DO THIS.

notes.added_text: Can’t remember if I reblogged this already, but it’s worth hearing again.
What frustrates me the most about this is that I couldn’t buy the episodes if I wanted to. They’re not available in...

posts.title: SAVING DC NATION
posts.body:
inbetweenthelineart:

junryou:

elfgrove:

artemisismyspitfire:

razaya:

marinaandthediadems:

okay, all i’m saying is, have YJ and GLTAS really been cancelled? has CN come out and said, “Yes, it is true, we are not picking up Young Justice or Green Lantern for new seasons” because until they have, I still have faith. I mean, they didn’t put them in their lineup because they haven’t put them into production yet, which is clearly a sign that they’re wavering, but that doesn’t mean they’re cancelled. maybe i’m just an optimist. maybe i’m in denial. all i’m saying is:

STAY WHELMED EVERYONE. 

All will be well <3

I reeeaallllllyyy hate being “devil’s advocate” here, because trust me I want these shows back more than I will ever be able to explain, but according to people who have visited the WB studios in the last couple of months (Where YJ & GL are made/based) their offices are already gone and replaced :( Does that mean they’re for sure not coming back? No, but it does mean that it will probably take a little more time than if they were still there.

This doesn’t mean give up though. THIS MEANS BE MORE PERSISTENT.  The more people who give up after the finales, the less likely our shows are going to come back. The less people who give up, the more likely we’ll get these back. 

I’m sorry to be the bearer of bad news, but they HAVE said that. I didn’t want to believe it at first either, but we got that confirmation the same day the 2013-2014 line-up list came out. [link] and [link] They avoided using the word “canceled”, because of the negative connotations of the term. Technically, they can say that. The shows will run to completion, so they weren’t canceled but the network chose not to renew them and most of the crew has begun work on new projects. The production offices for both shows are gone.

“This time we knew,” said Volpe. “They just didn’t want us to announce it publicly until they did.”

Now, that’s no reason to give up. It’s rare, but fans have gotten shows brought back before. It could happen. The trick is, when the final episodes air is not some deadline by which the letters and FB comments and everything else should stop. It has to keep going past that. Beware the Batman and New Teen Titans Go! are in production, they are going to air. We need to keep pushing that the next shows in the DC Nation line-up after those seasons end should be season 2 GLTAS and season 3 YJ. 

Like elfgrove said, the finales are not a signal to stop the campaign. If anything, they should be a leaping-off point for a MASSIVE influx of support for the show. Why wait until then, though?

Send in your letters! Work up your courage to call the viewer lines and leave a message. Post on the Cartoon Network and Warner Bros. Entertainment pages. Tweet to CN and WB too. If you can, do this EVERY DAY. The more of us show continuous support, the larger and more persistent our voice will be.

If you TRULY want to see our shows renewed, you need to stop hoping others will do it for you. Be active. Be politely aggressive. Be positive.

^^^^

Make your voices heard!
I’m fact, I’m thinking of having a phone in campaign as well??

notes.added_text: Elfgrove speaks the truth. The key is going to be how motivated and active can we keep the fandom after the finales. If...
Someone very inspirational once said “I cannot give up. My spirit will not be broken. All will be well”. I say we honor...

posts.title: I don't much talk about the media I consume on here...
posts.body:
gabzilla-z:

runes-to-my-memory:

… But am I the only one upset about what Green Lantern Animated has done with Aya these last few episodes?

Not only did they confuse a logical lack-of-emotion with severe depression and rage, but today’s episode pretty much said that she was going to be evil no matter what.

Emotions made her evil. So the guardians shut them off. Then she got emotions back after traveling with Razer. And then she got depressed, and “shut off” her emotions. Which made her evil.

Aya was my favorite character on the show. I loved watching her learn to navigate the emotional spectrum, and I liked the development of her relationship with Razer.

But then the writers did this to her, out of nowhere. They have her wiping out entire star systems, killing billions upon billions of sentients, which IMO is completely irredeemable, and in today’s episode they basically said that we shouldn’t have trusted her to begin with.

I am not okay with this. I’m going to watch the episodes that are left, but this development has made me not care if the show comes back. Which is a shame, because they finally hinted at Blackest Night in this episode, and I’d been waiting for that since the beginning.

*sigh*

Aya was never evil to begin with. She was curious and displayed free will, which is why the Science Director shut her off. She couldn’t control her.

Besides, the reason why she shot at her was because she didn’t want to be destroyed. Wanting to live is not evil. :) 

As for the destroying star systems…I’m hoping those were inhabited. :/ Because I do have issues with that.

I do, however, want to stress that there’s a member in the crew who destroyed a planet knowing full well that he was killing a lot of people by doing so. Not to mention that he participated in the murders of who knows how many Green Lanterns.

So how many killings make redemption acceptable? Is Razer less guilty because he killed less people?

This is a really interesting discussion.

notes.added_text: Being curious has always been a “bad thing” for most civilizations and cultures in the world. Emotions are hard to...
Thank you, Gabz.
I am really hoping that if (when) Aya does come to her senses, we get a little conversation between her and Razer about...
This is a really interesting discussion.
AYA is the Green Lantern’s shadow beast. She can’t be controlled so she is called evil.
I agree with this, I mean, a few days ago, there was this video about a sapient AI circulating on some of my friend’s...

posts.caption:
writtensword:

From A Tree of Palme.

guys i know from a plot and pacing standpoint this movie was slow as balls
BUT:

  • baby robots
  • baby robots struggling with their identity as baby robots
  • baby robots being rejected, used, cast aside by people who are supposed to care for them
  • baby robots missing people they love
  • baby robots scaring people around them with how strongly they feel love????
  • baby robots going through self-destructive, emotional rampancy and being possessed by malevolent forces beyond their control
  • subplots of human/humanoid beings living in a world with alien plants and creatures
  • baby robots being BROUGHT BACK from the abyss by their friends, and summoning the ever-present life force within themselves to bring themselves BACK.
  • OH YA AND STUDIO 4 degrees who animated Thundercats also animated this. :U

  • baby robots having hopes and dreams and running through endless fields holding blue flowers

posts.title: #CovertCorps on Saturday!
posts.body:
purlsbeforewine:

By now we pretty much all know what to do, but just in case - for those new to the campaign or in need of a refresher - here’s what to do and what not to do on Twitter tomorrow morning:

  • Use the tag #CovertCorps starting at about 9:45AM Eastern, fifteen minutes before DC Nation begins; keep using it through the programming block. Make sure you capitalize and spell #CovertCorps EXACTLY as is, otherwise your tweets won’t count to Twitter.
  • Don’t use any other tags! If you use multiple tags in one tweet, then your tweet, whatever it’s tagged, won’t count then either. So stick with #CovertCorps!
  • Mention GLTAS and Young Justice (without tagging them) in your tweets, and feel free to address your tweets to @cartoonnetwork, @WarnerBrosEnt, @DCComics, etc., to make sure they see what you’re saying.
  • Tweet steadily throughout DC Nation! Don’t put yourself in Twitter Jail - if you make more than 100 tweets/retweets in an hour, your ability to tweet/retweet will be temporarily disabled - but do keep active.
  • Retweets count towards the trending potential of the tag, so if you see a tweet that you like, retweet it!
  • Make sure that your twitter account is public - that is, that you haven’t “locked” your account - as otherwise your tweets (again) won’t count.
  • Please, GLTAS fans, tweet for Young Justice - stick around that extra half hour. And Young Justice fans, please get up that half hour earlier to tweet for GLTAS, too.

Last week was AMAZING! Not only did we trend in the USA for an hour, we also trended WORLDWIDE for about a half hour. And that is incredible! With every week of success, we draw more attention to our campaign to get GLTAS and YJ renewed.

So please, remember this above all else: STAY POSITIVE! Symbiosi! All will be well! <3

C’MON, FRIENDS!
LET’S DO THIS!

notes.added_text: get ready for the three part finale i hope i will cry
Ready for another trending session tomorrow! Chins up, DC Nation!
I dusted off my twitter for this. I’m ready to go.

barlee:

If only you had listened to your SAD little farmgirl, Razer!!! lol

I dunno but when Atrocitus said that line, I kinda chuckled inside. Even though it’s sad and mean. Then I had this image of the painting “The Farmer and His Wife”. And I thought, haha that will make a funny picture. Except it turned serious when I started working on it and became really awkward…. HAHA. Then I drew the pitchfork over the sword and it became 5% funny, but still awkward. XD

This is what happens when I try to be witty. COMPLETE FAIL. LOL.

Edit:
 I changed this post to private because I was wasn’t happy with the drawing. Then I woke up to find Isaia’s sweet comment and realized it doesn’t matter.

Thank you, Isaia. =’]

No,THANK
YOU

notes.added_text: You mean this one? the actual title is American Gothic.

tags: ...razaya would be grumpy kataang OH GOD KLJSDF
posts.caption:
barlee:

I love the way the characters are, and I wouldn’t ever want to change Razer, but I couldn’t help but draw this for my own amusement. A younger Razer would completely change the dynamic of the crew (I doubt Hal would be begging him for his help in combat… or at least more reluctant), but I thought… The only way Aya’s and Razer’s relationship could be more adorable warped is if Razer biologically looked younger than her. Can you imagine Kilowog giving the kid an even harder time? I imagine he’d take advantage of his size and sit on his head on a consistent basis. And then Hal being good ol’ Hal toward him… he already calls him “Kid” anyway.

Don’t mind me… I gobbled up on stuff like Please Save My Earth, and Onegai Teacher and now it’s making it’s rounds.

notes.added_text: I’ve actually felt for the longest time that Ilana might be slightly older than Razer, idk why….but that would make...
Aw, kid Razer’s a cutie!
BABY RAZER. ASDFGHJKL;’

posts.caption:
korratic:

viivus:

It’s STUPID COMICS TIME AGAIN

I call this, ‘The Legend of Mako,’ part one of WHO KNOWS HOW MANY but I have enough ideas for two or three more of these comic sets. Yes, instead of scanning those mako comics I mentioned forever ago straight from my sketchbook I went out of my way to rewrite and redraw them into two-row chunks. I don’t know if that makes it any more or less funny.

Also:

*translation: SEE IF I CARRY YOUR PASTY BUTT ACROSS THIS CITY AGAIN

HAHAH, this is so accurate!

notes.added_text: Yup.
As an enormous Avatar/Korra fan, LMFAO!!! IT’S SO TRUE!!!
This is one reason I hated Mako.
Far too accurate. Seriously fuck this stupid love plot. This comic is hilarious though!
ahh I hated the love triangle subplot, it was one of the major reasons Korra wasn’t as great as the original series…

posts.caption:
last text messages from the victims of the daegu subway fire on february 18, 2003.

“I’m sorry. I can’t bring your shoes and bag. I was going to make you a pork cutlet.. sorry.. my daughter. I love you.”

“You really make me hate youㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ get lostㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ bye”

“There’s a fire. I will go to heaven first.”

“Without oppa you must not skip meals and listen to your parents.. get itㅋㅋ and don’t wait for me I won’t come”

“Oppa is in an emergency I think I need to be away. Don’t wait for me and go back. Alright? I love you.”

“ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋDon’t waitㅋㅋI’m not comming ㅋㅋㅋ I’m sick of youㅋㅋㅋㅋ”

“Study hard and be a good person. Dad is sorry.”

“ㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠㅠ<-my feelings”

“ㅇㅇcall emergency tell them there’s a fire in the subway don’t panic and keep calm. Alright? Oppa’s okay”

“What if I suddenly disappear tomorrow? What would you do? just curious ㅎㅎ”

“Don’t Wait”

“I’m sorry that I was mad at you this morning it wasn’t what i meant honey I love you forever”

notes.added_text: I’m crying oh my god
I remember this. Can’t even imagine how it would feel like…
“don’t wait for me i won’t come”
this is so so sad

posts.title: ISAIA WEEKEND FUN-SKETCH COMMISSIONS POST
posts.body:
Hi Guys! I’ve gotten some time off, so I’m going on a brief Spring trip on March 6-10 to visit some friends in Burbank, California. So in this rare occasion, I am opening up commissions! 20 slots open!  15 slots open!

Sketch - 12$
Simple Color - 20$

Also, if you are near the area and wanna stop by and hang, and are not a jerk/axe-murderer let me kno!

Send me a note and let me know! Paypal only pls! c:

PEACE OUT!

Here is mein art tag if you want to look through!

notes.added_text: GUYS GO BUY SOME FABULOUS ISAIA ARTS. DOOO IIIT. >D
Does tha mean you’ll hang out at Moors Deli Saturday?
Huaaah signal boost!

notes.reply_text: YAY! I live in Burbank!! I have a seminar March 7th through the 10th during the day though. =[ But anytime after 8pm I'm free!

notes.added_text: I SWEAR TO GOD IF ALL THE SPOTS GOT FULL BEFORE I SENT HER MONEY I WILL GO ON A MURDEROUS RAMPAGE
BUY ISAIA’S ART SO SHE CAN COME OUT AND VISIT ME X3
